languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, с радостью докладываю, что ремонтные работы завершены. Осталась последняя формальность — посетить Наместника Владайма. Как только вы переговорите с ним, корабль готов будет покинуть Футфол".

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, с радостью докладываю, что ремонтные работы завершены. Осталась последняя формальность — посетить Наместника Владайма. Как только вы переговорите с ним, корабль готов будет покинуть Футфол".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Vladaym. As soon as you finish with this, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Vladaym. As soon as you finish with this, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我很高兴地向您报告，维修工作已经完成。目前我们只剩下最后一件事情要做：拜访托卡拉总督。等您和他见完面之后，我们的虚空舰就可以离开落脚港了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我很高兴地向您报告，维修工作已经完成。目前我们只剩下最后一件事情要做：拜访托卡拉总督。等您和他见完面之后，我们的虚空舰就可以离开落脚港了。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, me alegro de poder informarle de que las reparaciones han terminado. Queda una última formalidad: visitar al Señor Tocara. Una vez hable con él, la nave estará lista para partir de Paso».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, me alegro de poder informarle de que las reparaciones han terminado. Queda una última formalidad: visitar al Señor Tocara. Una vez hable con él, la nave estará lista para partir de Paso».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich freue mich, Ihnen mitteilen zu können, dass die Reparaturen abgeschlossen sind. Es bleibt nur noch eine letzte Formalität — der Besuch bei Lehnsherr Tocara. Sobald Sie mit ihm gesprochen haben, wird das Hohlraumschiff bereit sein, Footfall zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer que les réparations sont terminées. Il ne reste qu'une dernière formalité à accomplir... rendre visite au suzerain Tocara. Dès que vous aurez pu vous entretenir avec lui, le vaisseau sera prêt à quitter Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer que les réparations sont terminées. Il ne reste qu'une dernière formalité à accomplir... rendre visite au suzerain Tocara. Dès que vous aurez pu vous entretenir avec lui, le vaisseau sera prêt à quitter Castel. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、嬉しい報告です。修理が完了しました。あとは最後にやるべきことがひとつ。トカラ領主との面会です。あの方と話せばすぐにでも、ヴォイドシップはフットフォールを出発する準備が整います」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、嬉しい報告です。修理が完了しました。あとは最後にやるべきことがひとつ。トカラ領主との面会です。あの方と話せばすぐにでも、ヴォイドシップはフットフォールを出発する準備が整います」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, onarımların tamamlandığını bildirmekten mutluluk duyuyorum. Tek bir formalite kaldı, o da Emîr Tocara'yı ziyaret etmek. Uçsuz gemisi, siz onunla konuşur konuşmaz Binliman'dan ayrılmaya hazır olacak."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. There is only one last formality left — to visit Liege Tocara. As soon as you speak to him, the voidship will be ready to leave Footfall."
